info.title: (title)
info.description: API for a custom three-player chess variant game server. Authentication is required via a JWT Bearer token for protected endpoints.

post.summary: Log in to get an authentication token

patch.summary: Update the current authenticated user's profile

get.summary: Get the current authenticated user's profile

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

post.summary: Assign a bot to a game - Admin / Owner only

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

post.summary: Create a new bot user - Admin only

delete.summary: Delete a bot user (changes the user type back to Regular) - Admin only

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

patch.summary: Update an existing bot's configuration - Admin

post.description: Creates a new game and adds the creator as the first player.

get.description: Returns a list of games that are in the 'waiting' state and not full.

post.summary: Finish a game in a specific outcome (Admin only)

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

get.description:
Used only for type generation.
Actual subscription to game events is done via WebSocket at /ws

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.
There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

post.summary: Make a move in a game

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

post.summary: Start a game, if all player slots are filled and you are the creator

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

get.summary: Get the full state of a specific game
Get the move history of a specific game

post.summary: Create a new tournament - Admin only

get.summary: Get a list of all users
Get a list of all bot users

delete.summary: Remove a user from a specific game (Admin only)

token.description: The JWT token to be used for authenticating subsequent requests.
